page.title: 09OPINION POLL OF BOUGHTON
page.content: Boughton is a nice place to live in with a nice atmosphere.After working in London or abroad, it is very relaxing to come back to a friendly village. I would like to see parking on only one side of the street and possibly a fish and chip shop. {Stanley Lebor} Boughton is expanding in terms of housing but the facilities are not keeping up with it. The village needs a bank, bakers and a chemist.It would also be an advantage driving wise to have restricted parking on one side of the Street. { Susan Bing} This village is a happy compromise between a town and a village. It has more going for it than a village but is not as busy and noisy as a town. { Arthur Smedley.
